author: Stephanie Armour, Jon Hilsenrath
title: Government and Businesses Turn Attention to Eventual Reopening of $22 Trillion U.S. Economy - The Wall Street Journal
description: Once social distancing slows coronavirus pandemic, tough questions follow over how to get the nation back to work: ‘It isn’t like a light switch on and off’
content:
Government officials and business leaders are turning their attention to a looming challenge in the fight against the new coronavirus pandemic: Reopening a $22 trillion U.S. economy that has been shut down like never before.
With some preliminary signs that … [+276 chars]
